mapper.select: SELECT spec_no as specNo, spec_name as specName FROM spec WHERE spec_type = #{specType} ORDER BY spec_name

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM franchisee_faq
faq_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, file_name as fileName, extension as extension, origin_name as originName FROM franchisee_pic WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, cpu as cpu, vga as vga, ram as ram FROM franchisee_spec WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO franchisee_spec( franchisee_no, cpu, vga, ram ) VALUES ( #{franchiseeNo}, #{cpu}, #{vga}, #{ram} )
INSERT INTO franchisee_pic ( franchisee_no, file_name, extension, content_type, size, origin_name ) VALUES( #{franchiseeNo}, #{fileName}, #{extension}, #{contentType}, #{size}, #{originName} )
mapper.select: SELECT seat_no as seatNo, seat_row as seatRow, seat_cols as seatCols, seat_use as seatUse FROM seat WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}

SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, franchisee_crn as franchiseeCrn, franchisee_name as franchiseeName, franchisee_phone as franchiseePhone, franchisee_pic as franchiseePic, owner_no as ownerNo FROM franchisee WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, franchisee_name as franchiseeName, franchisee_pic as franchiseePic FROM franchisee WHERE owner_no = #{owner_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seat( seat_no, seat_row, seat_cols, franchisee_no ) VALUES( #{seatNo}, #{seatRow}, #{seatCols}, #{franchisee.franchiseeNo} )
INSERT INTO franchisee( franchisee_no, franchisee_crn, franchisee_name, franchisee_phone, owner_no ) VALUES( #{franchiseeNo}, #{franchiseeCrn}, #{franchiseeName}, #{franchiseePhone}, #{ownerNo} )
